page.title: 15EVENTS AND FUND RAISING
page.content: Events during the summer months in Beadnell. W.I.fete, Â£57l W.I. County effort-coffee evening Â£128 Church fete.- Â£1470. Church coffee evening-Tughall Â£370. N.S.P.C.C.-coffee morning, Â£126 R.N.L.I.- coffee morning, Â£310 Sailing club .- Jubilee fete, Â£1,200. Harbour fund stall.- Â£171. Craster Arms - Leek Club, Â£128. Village Hall efforts.- auction Â£300 Car Boot sales,Â£365.Official opening 18th August,events during week,cheese &wine,barbecue & disco,carpet bowls children's sports,pie & pea supper& musical evening,& pet show. Events during winter months include Halloween,Bonfire & firework display,& children's Christmas party.
